title: En Mana Vaanil Song Lyrics Kasi
stanzas: En Mana Vaanil Song Lyrics Kasi

En mana vaanil siragai
virikkum vanna paravaigale
en kadhayai kaettal
ungal siragugal
thannaal moodikollum (2)

kala kala kala kalavena
thulli kuthithidum
chinna chiru alaiye
en nilaiayai kaettaal
ungal thullalum
thaanaai adangi vidum.

ungalai pole siragugal
virikka naanum aasai konden
siragugal indri vaanathil
paranthu dhinam dhinam
thirumbi vanthen

oru paatu podhumo
eduthu koorave
idhayam thaangumo
nee kooru.

En mana vaanil siragai
virikkum vanna paravaigale
en kadhayai kaettal
ungal siragugal
thannaal moodikollum

kala kala kala kalavena
thulli kuthithidum
chinna chiru alaiye
en nilaiayai kaettaal
ungal thullalum
thaanaai adangi vidum.

iraivanidam varangal kaetten
swarangalai avane koduthaan
manatharil ithai yaarum arivaro

naan paadum paadal ellaam
naan patta paade andro
boomiyil idhai yaaro
unarvaaro.

manathile maaligai vaasam
kidaithatho mara nizhal nesam
etharkkum naan kalangiathillai
ingae.

raagamundu thaazhamundu
ennai naane thatti kolven
en nenjil unmai undu
verenna vendum.
en mana vaanil ..

porukkai paattai sonnaar
porulatra paate aagum
vaadinen adhai naadum
naalum

porulillaa paataanaalum
porulaiye potu selvaar
potrume en nenjam
nenjam

manamullor ennai paarpaar
manathinaal avarai paarpen
maranthidaa raagam
idhu thaane.

vazhkai ennum medai
thannil, naadangal
oaraayiram paarka
vandhen naanum
paarvai indri..
